name: Vineeta E Ticket Tours & Travel Reviews

review.title: “Working at Vineeta e ticket makes me feel Happy and contented..It feels so good when we are talked about and appreciated”
review.pros: Pros – One obvious benefit of working in the travel and tourism office is the opportunity to actually hop on a plane and see many locales at low prices, or even gratis. Another benefit is the fact that the field is international and changes along with global trends.
review.cons: Cons – The things that are least satisfying in a job experience are pretty universalMost people would agree on staff not doing their job or passing the buck to be the most annoying. Another problem that essentially can make or break a team is negative attitudes
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
